name: Fluff vs Covid
description:
Help Fluffy destroy Covid. 

Fluffy is a white blood cell that is designed to destroy the Covid-19 or Corona virus.

Help him by guiding him to get them all, but beware, let too many through and it's 'Game over'!

Move left and right using 'A' or 'D' or arrow keys on the keyboard OR Click the screen on the side you want Fluffy to move to.

Play on browser or Download. Android (5 M), Windows (40 M), Max OS (50 M not sure on this.) and Linux (55 M not sure if it works) available.

Donating to this project will help people who have lost their income due to the Covid19 pandemic. Please check back from time to time, we will up date you on how it's going. 

Thanks.
